name: Rail Racing (itch)
description:
Take a game like Mario Kart. Take away the steering wheel, the gas, the brakes, the red hat, the mustache, and most everything else and you'll be left with Rail Racing.

There are 3 rails making of the track, you will race against the CPU jumping between the rails to get the very best lap time.

No need to download anything! It's playable in your desktop or mobile browser! Try it out here https://21mk89on9y.codesandbox.io/
